metadata.name: Light the fire
metadata.description:
"Light the fire."

You told me so.

I tried to light your cigarette.

But you lit it yourself.

Wondering, I lit my own cigarette, too.

Now that I think about it, maybe it was not about cigarettes.

The dark room was filled with the same colors as that day.

I think as I exhale smoke.

"Light the fire."
